name: systime
description: NodeJS Event Based System Time Keeper
author: Gregory Langlais

scripts.test-ci: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --require test/support/env --reporter spec --check-leaks test/
scripts.test-cov: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --require test/support/env --reporter dot --check-leaks test/
